intro: Oreocharis concava, commonly known as the concave oreocharis, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, greenish-white flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and arranged alternately along the stem. Oreocharis concava is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and mountainous regions.
